scripts.runtime:prepare: npm run build:incremental:inc:ui2abc --prefix ../../incremental/runtime && npm run build:incremental:inc:ui2abc:recheck --prefix ../../incremental/runtime
scripts.demo:run:light: npm run compile --prefix demo && npm run run --prefix demo
scripts.demo:run: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run demo:run:light
scripts.test: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run test:light
scripts.compile:deps: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run compile:deps:harness && npm run runtime:prepare
scripts.test:diagnostics: npm run compile && npm run diagnostics
scripts.test:all:light: npm run test:light && npm run diagnostics && npm run executable:light
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run diagnostics && npm run executable
